```{r message=FALSE}
library("sf")
library("data.table")
```

```{r}
nc = read_sf(system.file("shape/nc.shp", package = "sf"))
ls = vector("list", 500)
for (i in seq_along(ls)) ls[[i]] = nc
```

```{r}
system.time({
  dt = rbindlist(ls, use.names = FALSE)
  dt[["geometry"]] = st_sfc(dt[["geometry"]], recompute_bbox = TRUE)
  dt = st_as_sf(dt)
})

```

```{r}
system.time({
  df_sf = do.call(rbind, ls)
})

```
